channel.title: Taxation on Lionel Ragot
channel.description: Recent content in Taxation on Lionel Ragot

item.title: Croissance endogène et pollution: Une approche fondée sur le comportement du consommateur
item.description: This paper develops a continuous time model of endogenous growth based on innovations in consumption goods.

item.title: Fiscalité environnementale et sensibilité écologique des consommateurs
item.description: This paper describes a dynamic applied general equilibrium model, with perfect foresight, designed for clarifying the questions concerning taxation and the environment.
